text: Nec dwellers oppidum nor Arabs them seek stay messenger DEUS when he mobilizes pro war Nor shall they dedit priority to their suus affairs supporting eum. Hoc est they non suffer any thirst any effort hunger causa DEUS take single step enrages disbelievers inflict any hardship enemy sine habet it scripsit them credit DEUS NUNQUAM fails recompense those work righteousness
